backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Help me understand where I am spending my time and identify ways I can reclaim time to focus more on my top priorities.

gutts.name: Calendar Historical Data Retrieval
gutts.capability: Load past calendar events for specified time period (weeks/months)
gutts.user_goal: Get comprehensive time usage data for analysis
gutts.evidence: Calendar API query for historical events in analysis period

gutts.name: Meeting Categorization & Classification
gutts.capability: Classify meetings by type, purpose, importance level, and participants
gutts.user_goal: Understand what kinds of meetings fill the calendar
gutts.evidence: Classification model applied to each historical meeting

gutts.name: Time Aggregation & Statistical Analysis
gutts.capability: Compute time spent per category, participant, project, and other dimensions
gutts.user_goal: Quantify where time is actually going
gutts.evidence: Aggregation queries computing total hours by various dimensions

gutts.name: Priority Alignment Assessment
gutts.capability: Evaluate which time usage aligns with stated priorities and identify gaps
gutts.user_goal: See misalignment between goals and actual time usage
gutts.evidence: Comparison of time allocation vs priority importance weights

gutts.name: Low-Value Meeting Identification
gutts.capability: Flag meetings that consume time without supporting priorities
gutts.user_goal: Know which meetings to eliminate or delegate
gutts.evidence: Identification of meetings with low priority alignment and high time cost

gutts.name: Time Reclamation Opportunity Analysis
gutts.capability: Calculate potential time savings from proposed changes (decline/delegate/shorten)
gutts.user_goal: Understand how much time could be reclaimed
gutts.evidence: Calculation of hours saved if low-value meetings are eliminated

gutts.name: Schedule Optimization Recommendations
gutts.capability: Suggest specific changes (decline, delegate, shorten, consolidate meetings)
gutts.user_goal: Know exactly what to do to reclaim time
gutts.evidence: Generated list of specific meeting changes with expected time savings

gutts.name: Time Usage Reporting & Visualization
gutts.capability: Present insights with charts, summaries, and comparisons (current vs optimal)
gutts.user_goal: Easily understand patterns and take action
gutts.evidence: Generated dashboard showing time distribution and reclamation opportunities

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 8 GUTTs
